resources.string: Time Frame: Enter day for day meal plan)
Target Calories: What is the caloric target for one day?. eg(2000, 1500)
Diet: Enter a diet that the meal plan has to adhere to: Gluten Free, Vegetarian, Ketogenic, Vegan, Lacto-Vegetarian, Ovo-Vegetarian, Pescetarian, Paleo, Primal, Whole30
Excluded: A comma-separated list of allergens or ingredients that must be excluded, eg(oil,fish,meat,butter.
